trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_00<tab>Ketenramm, living legend and Eorzean explorer extraordinaire, would like to chat.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_01<tab>Ketenramm has invited you and your comrades to his home, which is situated nearby. You cannot help but consider the subtle shade of his irises on your way to the Blue-eyes' Abode...

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_02<tab>In speaking with her father's old friend, Wuk Lamat discovers some parallels between Ketenramm's bond with Gulool Ja Ja and her own with the Scions. Comrades are precious indeed─especially when they can deduce the location of the golden prize one seeks. Krile shares her growing suspicion that the legendary city may be located in the forests of Yak T'el, and thus the group resolves to ask the now cordial citizens for information while replenishing their traveling supplies.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_03<tab>According to Erenville, Ketenramm and his mentor are acquaintances, but the gleaner is as reserved as ever when it comes to sharing details about his personal life. He excuses himself to go and meet the others by the aetheryte.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_04<tab>Resupplied yet still bereft of clues, your group reassembles. Luckily, Miilal Ja would repay your kindness to her community by divulging all she knows about the golden city while Zereel Ja pointedly turns a blind eye. All parts of the Ja Tiika Heartland have been thoroughly charted except for the Skydeep Cenote, the final resting place of countless young lives lost. Comparing Miilal Ja's testimony with those of Hunmu Rruk and Vorporlor, it seems all but certain that you have at last discovered the city's location. With Bakool Ja Ja's blessed scale in hand, you set forth to Gok Draak Descent...

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_05<tab>The doors of the cenotaph loom above you and the air is thick with the smell of earth, water, and age. Your group offers prayers to the souls of the departed before doing what you must to see the rite of succession to its end.
※To enlist your companion NPCs for this duty, speak with them near the entrance or access Duty Support via the main menu. Use the Duty Finder if you wish to complete the instance alongside fellow players.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_06<tab>In the deepest recesses of the cenote, you come upon a grand door, locked with what Krile recognizes as a Sharlayan seal. When Wuk Lamat places her completed tablets upon the provided pedestal, the door opens, revealing an extraordinary room. Black stone and glowing lights seem almost Allagan at first, but their differences quickly outnumber the similarities.
A gate stands dormant at the far end of the room─but before anyone can comment on it, the Dawnservant's booming laugh announces his arrival. Further discussion of this latest mystery is set aside for the time being, as the impending celebration demands everyone's attention. Wuk Lamat has discovered the entrance to the city of gold and successfully completed the rite of succession.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_07<tab>Though your questions far outweigh whatever answers you gleaned about the golden city, they will have to wait. For now, your group heads back to Tuliyollal for some well-deserved rest and to celebrate Wuk Lamat's achievements.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SEQ_08<tab>Wuk Lamat has gone ahead to the palace to prepare for her ascension ceremony. In the meantime, your haggard-yet-happy group of friends seem ready for a bath and a nap.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_02<tab>Wait at the designated location.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_03<tab>Ride the imposing beast.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_04<tab>Enter the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_05<tab>Enter the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_001<tab>Tankwa <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> look similar to some Eorzean sailors I've seen, but I never would have guessed he was <var 1A 02 /var>Ketenramm<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_002<tab>We ought to speak with Ketenramm before we do anything else.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_003<tab>This is my first time meeting Ketenramm. A Roegadyn if I ever saw one.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_004<tab>Of all the things I expected to discover in Tural, Eorzea's most legendary sailor was not among them...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALISAIE_000_005<tab>It's never too late to let go of prejudice. No matter how difficult it may seem, it can be done.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_006<tab>This ain't no place for a proper chat.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_007<tab>Me cabin's just north of the city. “Blue-eyes' Abode,” as people here call it on account of me dazzlin' twinklers.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_010<tab>Naught but four walls and a roof, but enough for most folk. Make yerselves comfortable.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_011<tab>I wonder how long it's been since he settled down here...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_012<tab>The man values his privacy...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_013<tab>I've heard that upon Ketenramm's disappearance, explorers from across Eorzea banded together in search of him. But I doubt they ever thought to look here...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>A rather humble residence for a legendary explorer. I would've expected a manor decorated with exotic treasures.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_015<tab>Why did you choose to settle down in Mamook? They haven't exactly been welcoming to outsiders─legendary explorer or otherwise.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_016<tab>All the more reason to keep a weather eye on 'em. Though seein' how ye've won them over, methinks I'll have less need for vigilance.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_017<tab>I'm here at Gulool Ja Ja's behest to ensure his hard-won peace is kept. And, incidentally, to remind Zereel Ja of his duty as elector should he have forgotten it.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_018<tab>My old man ordered you to stay here? That's no way to treat an honored guest...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_019<tab>Heh. I'd say I'm more than yer father's “guest” by now. Or didn't ye see the sepulchre atop Worqor Zormor?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_020<tab>That's right...“Ketenramm” was one of the names!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_100_021<tab>Yer father and I fought shoulder to shoulder in many a battle, Valigarmanda bein' but one of our triumphs. He and I are brothers.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_021<tab>So when yer brother tells you to stand watch, ye stand watch. Ye trust in his judgment an' his strength of will─even if that means ye have to sit out the occasional scrap.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_022<tab>Surely you understand such a bond? Surrounded as ye are by all these bright an' eager faces.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_023<tab>I do. My comrades are my strength─and it's thanks to them that I understand Papa's hopes for this nation. What I must continue to protect.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_024<tab>Then prove yer readiness for the throne, Wuk Lamat. Find the golden city!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>Oh, I will. With these ones beside me, even uncovering a legend should be child's play!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_026<tab>Especially since I believe I already have.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_027<tab>All by yourself!? How!? When!?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_028<tab>Well, as you know, electors are forbidden from giving unfair advantage to claimants.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_029<tab>So when Hunmu Rruk refused to divulge <var 1A 02 /var>why<var 1A 01 /var> my grandfather passed through Iq Br'aax twenty years ago, his silence spoke volumes.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALISAIE_000_030<tab>You think Galuf's visit had something to do with the golden city?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_031<tab>Precisely. Moreover, only the Yok Huy who lived in Yak T'el ever dreamt those golden dreams.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_032<tab>When exposed to certain triggers, those with magical aptitude have been known to receive visions.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_100_032<tab>And if Gurfurlur's abilities are at all representative, the Yok Huy are no stranger to the arcane...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_200_032<tab>Which means the dreamers of eld likely owe their experiences to their inherent qualities and their proximity to the city itself. Here, in these forests.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>Then all we need to do is search Yak T'el from top to bottom, right?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_034<tab>It would behoove us to try and narrow our focus. To that end, I propose we return to Mamook and make inquiries.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_035<tab>While there, we can all take the opportunity to see to any necessary travel preparations. When everyone is ready, let us assemble at the aetheryte.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_036<tab>...You're Cahciua's boy, ain't ye?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_037<tab>She told me about you. Said she tasked ye with findin' the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_038<tab>Aye. I might even succeed, despite my best efforts.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_039<tab>I had begun to think it was a fool's errand. My own fruitless search in my youth proved as much.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_040<tab>Yet here you are, older and wiser, playin' the fool again.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_041<tab>Courtesy of the company I've been keeping, perhaps. Wuk Lamat's not the only one to have grown thanks to her comrades.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_042<tab>We'll find it. Together.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KETENRAMM_000_043<tab>Heh. Was I ever that young...?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_052<tab>You waited for me? It seems Ketenramm knows my mentor, so we chatted for a bit longer.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_053<tab>Alphinaud said to meet by the aetheryte, so I'll see you there.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_060<tab>The merchants were more than happy to mend my gear and sell me supplies.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_061<tab>One would hardly believe that they were ever averse to aiding visitors.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_062<tab>Hehe! You won't <var 1A 02 /var>believe<var 1A 01 /var> how many najool they gave me!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_063<tab>Now all we need is a hint to point us in the right direction. City of gold, here we come!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_064<tab>I think I can offer that much.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_065<tab>I have an inkling of where the golden city might be.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_066<tab>Miilal Ja! A-And Zereel Ja!? You've come to help us?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ZEREELJA_000_067<tab>As an elector, I am forbidden from speaking of the golden city. ...But my wife is beholden to no such constraints.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_068<tab>Then anything you can tell us would be greatly appreciated.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_069<tab>Our people have lived here for centuries. There is no corner of this forest we do not intimately know─save for one.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_070<tab>Do you recall the place I showed you, where my son confessed the truth of blessed siblings?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_071<tab>That stone pier stands at the entrance of the Skydeep Cenote. The final resting place for children we lost to our zealotry.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_100_071<tab>Precious few are permitted beyond the cenotaph doors, and we have not explored its deepest recesses. If the golden city is in Yak T'el, it may well be hidden there.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_072<tab>Will you permit us to search for it?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ZEREELJA_000_073<tab>...I have no reason to refuse you.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ZEREELJA_000_074<tab>No longer will we rely on blessed siblings, nor will we conceal the sacrifices made to conceive them.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ZEREELJA_000_075<tab>The cenote is no longer under our protection. It is a dismal burial ground...and our children deserve better. Their bodies will be moved to a place of comfort and peace.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_076<tab>I'm sure Bakool Ja Ja would appreciate that. And we're here to offer any help, if you need it.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_077<tab>Your father also visited the cenote, come to think of it.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_078<tab>It was many years ago by now, but a notable affair due to the foreigner he brought with him. A mage, I believe.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_079<tab>Truly!?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ZEREELJA_000_080<tab>The Dawnservant did not disclose his reasons, but he descended past our cenotaph and into the old Yok Huy quarries.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_081<tab>Doubtless the very same ones excavated by Vorporlor's dreamers.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_082<tab>Then the golden city must be there.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_083<tab>In the depths of the Skydeep Cenote!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_084<tab>Thank you, both of you. We'll set out straightaway!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_085<tab>You will find a winged beast or two lingering in Gok Draak Descent. They will carry you below.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_MIILALJA_000_086<tab>I believe in you, Third Promise. You will make a magnificent Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_087<tab>This is it, everyone. To the Skydeep Cenote!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_Q1_000_090<tab>Ride the beast to the Skydeep Cenote?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_POPMESSAGE_000_091<tab>With a powerful leap, the beast takes flight!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_092<tab>This is the cenotaph. Which means that beyond these doors is...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_093<tab>Rite of succession or no, disturbing the souls that rest here feels wrong.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_094<tab>I know...but I can't turn back. Let's pay our respects, at the very least.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_095<tab>Let's go.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_096<tab>I'm ready to complete my journey.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_100<tab>I confess, I anticipated my duty as a guide with no little weariness.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_101<tab>I knew our journey might change the course of my nation, but...I did not think it would change the course of my own life.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_A2_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_A2_000_002<tab>Form a party and enter the Skydeep Cenote.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_WUKLAMAT_000_102<tab>Part of me is sad to see our journey end...but I have to see what's waiting for us in there!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_103<tab>Wuk Evu, Mablu...so many people have helped us reach this moment. Let us honor their generosity and find the golden city at last!
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_104<tab>Cenotaphs are notorious for attracting malefic creatures. We must exercise all due caution.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALISAIE_000_105<tab>I don't know what's down there, but I'm eager to see it with my own eyes.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_PESHEKWA_100_120<tab>We have been eagerly awaiting your safe return.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ERENVILLE_000_120<tab>That was wholly unlike what I imagined in my youth... Since when did a place like that exist in Yok Tural?
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_121<tab>I understand now why the Students of Baldesion were petitioned...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_KRILE_000_122<tab>But what were my grandfather's findings? Not only regarding that stone, but that gate...
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALISAIE_000_123<tab>It feels as though we have more questions than we set out with. But for now, returning in one piece is cause enough for celebration.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_124<tab>Well, we've done it. We've seen Wuk Lamat to victory in the rite of succession.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_125<tab>Like me, I expect you have no few questions about the golden city, but they must wait until our claimant has settled into her new role.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_126<tab>Even as we speak, she prepares for the ascension ceremony back at the palace. I'm given to understand it will be held in a few days time.
TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_ALPHINAUD_000_127<tab>In the meantime, let us all enjoy some well-deserved rest.

TEXT_KINGMC113_04909_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>You may now enter the Skydeep Cenote with a party of NPC avatars. To make use of this feature, open the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trust<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
